songs.title: Sex Yeah (First Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)

[Verse 1]
Nothing is provocative
Anymore, even for kids
No room for imagining
'Cause everyone's seen everything

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Question what the TV tells you (Yeah, yeah) (La, da-da-da)
Question what a pop star sells you (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)
Question mom and question dad (Yeah) (La, da-da-da)
Question good and question bad (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)

[Chorus 1]
Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh (Yeah, yeah)
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh (Yeah, yeah)
Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh (Yeah)
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh (Yeah)

Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh (Yeah)
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh

[Bridge]
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex (Yeah)
Sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da)
Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex (La, da-da-da-da-da-da-da)

[Verse 2]
If women were religiously
Recognized sexually
We wouldn't have to feel the need
To show our ass it's to feel free

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Been there, done that, got the t-shirt (Yeah, yeah) (La, da-da)
Sold my soul, and yeah, the truth hurt (La, da-da-da-da-da-da)
Tired image of a star (Yeah, yeah)
Acting naughtier than we really are (La, da-da-da-da-da)

[Outro]
Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh

Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
